# New York DC R Conference
### Conference
#### May 10 - 11
### Workshops
#### May 9

[![](images/R-Conference-Logo.png)](https://www.rstats.nyc)

On May 10 and 11, the fifth New York R Conference will feature world-class data scientists sharing cutting-edge research and lessons from the field including [Andrew Gelman](https://statmodeling.stat.columbia.edu/), [Emily Robison](https://hookedondata.org/), [Wes McKinney](https://wesmckinney.com/), [Namita Nandakumar](https://hockey-graphs.com/author/namitanandakumar/), Brooke Watson, Mike Band and so many more. In addition, there will be will be [workshops](https://www.rstats.nyc/workshops/) by Max Kuhn, Elizabeth Sweeny, Dan Chen and Kaz Sakamoto on May 9. The conference and workshops will be hosted at [Work-Bench](https://www.work-bench.com/).

For more about the conference visit https://www.rstats.nyc and follow us on Twitter at [\@rstatsnyc](https://twitter.com/rstatsnyc).

You can see a recap of the previous [NYR Conferences](https://nyhackr.org) or our [DC R Conference](https://dc.rstats.ai/) on the [Conference page](nyr.html).
